removalSettings.title: Test Schedule Removal
removalSettings.description: Removing this will kill all reminders from the test schedule

notifications.title: This is your first notification!
notifications.content:
Hello! This is your welcome notification. Thank you for signing up!

From time to time, this app will display notifications to remind you to take actions based on the schedule you downloaded. Right now, let’s start with an introductory survey. Take note of your ID number: <#80ff80><> Tap this <#80ff80>Survey Link and enter in your ID number Then complete the measures and you’ll be all ready to continue.
